name: ApUt
description:
Ap-Ut is story of Eskimos meet Yeti.

if you want going to Next stage, find hidden Puzzle.

========= KEYBOARD =========

Move: WASD

Camera: Mouse

Run: Shift

JUMP: Space

Talk & Pick Up: F 

Attack: Q

Make a Snowball: R

Make Big Snowball: Double R

Throw a snowball: E

Menu: ESC

========= JoyStick =========

Move: Left Stick

Camera : Right Stick

Run: L1

JUMP: R1

Talk & Pick Up: X

Attack : A

Make a Snowball: Y

Make Big Snowball: Double Y

Throw a snowball: B

Menu: start button
